titles.title: It's You; It's You; It's You That Makes The Love Go Round

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's You; it's You; it's You that makes the love go round.
(Repeat 3x.)
It's you that makes the love go round.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So pass it on; His love is free for everyone.
(Repeat 3x.)
His love is free for everyone.
